snippet: The title he won against Manny Pacquiao was vacated after Mayweather failed to pay a sanctioning fee and give up a junior middleweight title he also held.
lead_paragraph: The title he won against Manny Pacquiao was vacated after Mayweather failed to pay a sanctioning fee and give up a junior middleweight title he also held.

headline.main: Floyd Mayweather Stripped of Welterweight Title for Failing to Follow W.B.O. Rules
